Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}:
Thank you for your Living Trust Order. So that we may expedite your revision, please address the following:
1. Has your Trust been executed (signed and notarized)? If yes, please supply the date which your Trust was signed and notarized.
2. Has your Trust been funded (title to at least one asset changed to reflect ownership by the Trust)? If no, please indicate which transfer letters need to be reprocessed.
3. Please confirm as to the following shipping address: XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX.
Please add to the above list any further changes in addition to those requested online.
If you have other questions, simply reply to this email or call us toll-free at 1-888-821-7574. We appreciate your business and look forward to serving your future legal document needs.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
